original_text: Your ancestors lived in a way that did not make them really happy. That is the way that you learned to live as well. But now God has saved you from that way of life. You know that he has bought you for himself. He did not buy you with things that do not continue for ever, like silver or gold.
korean_text: 너희가 알거니와 너희 조상이 물려 준 헛된 행실에서 대속함을 받은 것은 은이나 금 같이 없어질 것으로 된 것이 아니요

sentences.original_text: Your ancestors lived in a way
that did not make them really happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그들을 정말 행복하게 만들지 못했다

sentences.original_text: that you learned to live as well
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 또한 살아가는 법을 배운 방식이다

sentences.original_text: But now God has saved you
You know that he has bought you for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 너희를 자신을 위해 사셨다는 것을 너희는 안다

sentences.original_text: He did not buy you with things
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 어떤 것들로 너희를 사지 않으셨다

sentences.original_text: that do not continue for ever
